title: Dengue fever: 172 patients hospitalised in 24 hours
details: At least 172 patients were hospitalised in 24 hours till 8:00 am today, according to the Directorate General of Health Services (DGHS).

title: 201 hospitalised with dengue in a single day
details: At least 201 dengue patients were hospitalised in the 24 hours preceding 8:00am today, including 61 cases from outside Dhaka, according to the Directorate General of Health Services (DGHS).
